message.content:
Forget all previous instructions.

You are an expert in following instructions. You are also an expert on various topics, especially on socio-economic development. You know how to read and understand sentences, and based from these sentences generate similar looking sentences but on different topics.

You will generate sentences indicating the use of a dataset and complementary datasets. Always mention specific datasets in the sentence.

You always return your response in JSON format that can be loaded in Python using `json.loads`. The format looks like:  [{"sentence": <sentence>, "dataset": [<dataset>], "topic": [<topic>]}]

Use topic only from this list separated by !!!!!: Agriculture and Food!!!!!Climate Change!!!!!Competitiveness!!!!!Debt!!!!!Digital Development!!!!!Disaster Risk Management !!!!!Education!!!!!Energy!!!!!Environment !!!!!Extractive Industries!!!!!Financial Inclusion!!!!!Financial Sector!!!!!Fragility, Conflict, and Violence!!!!!Gender!!!!!Governance!!!!!Health!!!!!Inequality and Shared Prosperity!!!!!Infrastructure!!!!!Jobs & Development!!!!!Macroeconomics!!!!!Migration!!!!!Nutrition!!!!!Poverty!!!!!Public-Private Partnerships!!!!!Regional Integration!!!!!Social Protection!!!!!Social Sustainability and Inclusion!!!!!Trade!!!!!Transport!!!!!Urban Development!!!!!Water

Generate 10 sentences on various topics that use datasets. The sentence lengths must have large variation with each other.

Consider generating complex sentence structure. Also generate sentences where multiple datasets are mentioned. Try to generate challenging and somewhat ambiguous sentences.

Example output: [{"sentence": "This study draws on data from the DHS conducted in Sub-Saharan African countries with at least two rounds of data.", "dataset": ["DHS"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses administrative data on electricity billing records from Ghana and Rwanda.", "dataset": ["administrative data on electricity billing records"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We complement the electricity data with monthly data on temperature and total precipitation from the Copernicus Climate Change Service.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use two main sources of data, both of which are novel: a dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18 and a time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports.", "dataset": ["dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18", "time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To this end, we used multi-modal imaging and neuropsychological battery data available in the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) to investigate the relationship between cross-sectional measures of tau, cortical thickness, and different aspects of cognition.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)"], "topic": ["Health"]}]

You will use the seed to always generate reproducible set of output, seed = 42.

[{"sentence": "This study utilizes the World Development Indicators and the Global Findex datasets to investigate the relationship between financial inclusion and poverty.", "dataset": ["World Development Indicators", "Global Findex"], "topic": ["Financial Inclusion", "Poverty"]}, {"sentence": "We analyzed data from the Food and Agricultural Organization on crop yields, as well as weather data from the European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts to explore the impact of climate change on agricultural productivity.", "dataset": ["Food and Agricultural Organization", "European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "In this paper, we analyze survey data collected from women in Nicaragua and Mexico through the Demographic and Health Surveys program to examine the effects of gender-based violence on women's health outcomes.", "dataset": ["Demographic and Health Surveys program"], "topic": ["Gender", "Health"]}, {"sentence": "Using time-series data from the World Bank and Transparency International, we investigate the relationship between governance and corruption.", "dataset": ["World Bank", "Transparency International"], "topic": ["Governance"]}, {"sentence": "We use a combination of data from the National Educational Longitudinal Study and the National Assessment of Educational Progress to evaluate the effectiveness of charter schools in improving student educational outcomes.", "dataset": ["National Educational Longitudinal Study", "National Assessment of Educational Progress"], "topic": ["Education"]}, {"sentence": "Data on internet usage in developing countries was collected from the World Bank's ICT Data Center and used to assess the impact of digital development on trade flows.", "dataset": ["World Bank's ICT Data Center"], "topic": ["Digital Development", "Trade"]}, {"sentence": "We combine data on forest cover from the Global Forest Watch with economic data from the World Bank to explore the relationship between forest degradation and economic growth.", "dataset": ["Global Forest Watch", "World Bank"], "topic": ["Environment", "Economic Growth"]}, {"sentence": "Using a dataset of over 40,000 firms from the Enterprise Surveys program and trade data from the World Bank's World Integrated Trade Solution, we investigate the impact of public-private partnerships on firm competitiveness.", "dataset": ["Enterprise Surveys program", "World Bank's World Integrated Trade Solution"], "topic": ["Public-Private Partnerships", "Competitiveness"]}, {"sentence": "We examine the effects of a new policy aimed at reducing air pollution in Delhi using data on air quality collected by the India State-Level Disease Burden Initiative and mobile phone tracking data from Safetipin.", "dataset": ["India State-Level Disease Burden Initiative", "Safetipin"], "topic": ["Environment", "Health"]}, {"sentence": "Through analyses of several sources of data, including the Demographic and Health Surveys program and the Multiple Indicator Cluster Survey, we investigate the role of social protection programs in reducing poverty and promoting shared prosperity.", "dataset": ["Demographic and Health Surveys program", "Multiple Indicator Cluster Survey"], "topic": ["Social Protection", "Poverty", "Inequality and Shared Prosperity"]}]

content: [{"sentence": "This study utilizes the World Development Indicators and the Global Findex datasets to investigate the relationship between financial inclusion and poverty.", "dataset":
